mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT val) from jjg_fbgc_qlgc_zdhmcxs where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
SELECT DISTINCT lxbs from jjg_fbgc_qlgc_zdhmcxs where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
SELECT * from jjg_fbgc_qlgc_zdhmcxs where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' ORDER BY zdbs,qdzh,val
SELECT * from jjg_fbgc_qlgc_zdhmcxs where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' ORDER BY zdbs,qdzh,val
